data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Development in the lot adjacent to the botanic gardens should not be permitted to proceed. The ____ contains ____ pools, which ____ an ____ environment ____ many ____ species ____ to ____ presence ____ clay ____ the ____. By developing this area we would obliterate any chance for these amphibious species to thrive, ensuring their slow demise.
data.partBlankContent: Development in the lot adjacent to the botanic gardens should not be permitted to proceed. The l__ contains ver___ pools, which pro____ an aqu____ environment f__ many fr__ species d__ to t__ presence o_ clay ben____ the so__. By developing this area we would obliterate any chance for these amphibious species to thrive, ensuring their slow demise.
data.fullContent: Development in the lot adjacent to the botanic gardens should not be permitted to proceed. The lot contains vernal pools, which provide an aquatic environment for many frog species due to the presence of clay beneath the soil. By developing this area we would obliterate any chance for these amphibious species to thrive, ensuring their slow demise.
data.answer: 不应允许在靠近植物园的地段进行开发。这片土地包含了春天的池塘，它为许多青蛙物种提供了一个水生环境，因为土壤下面有黏土。通过开发这个区域，我们将消灭这些两栖物种繁衍的任何机会，确保它们的缓慢消亡。
